message.content:
cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.NE 

This paper deals with the problem of adaptive optimal control of nonlinear dynamic systems, which is a topic that falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY). The paper also discusses policy iteration and its convergence, which is a common technique used in machine learning and reinforcement learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). The theoretical comparison between policy iteration and value iteration suggests a focus on optimization and decision-making algorithms (cs.RO). Finally, the extension of the convergence results to multi-step look-ahead policy iteration suggests a focus on neural networks and deep learning (cs.NE).
